languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Benevolentia — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for extra turns), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——信奉者
每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时（额外{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}回合{/g}不计算在内），战场上每有一名友方角色（包括装备者本人）{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%，装备者就会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——信奉者
每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时（额外{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}回合{/g}不计算在内），战场上每有一名友方角色（包括装备者本人）{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%，装备者就会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}</u>。

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — поборник
Каждый раз в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} (за исключением {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительных ходов{/g}) персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} за каждого союзника, у которого осталось меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, а также за себя при соответствии этому условию.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: Благодеяние — поборник
Каждый раз в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} за каждого союзника, у которого осталось меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, а также за себя при соответствии этому условию.

Требуется: Благодеяние — поборник
Каждый раз в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} за каждого союзника, у которого осталось меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, а также за себя при соответствии этому условию.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時（{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}は除く）、使用者は50%以下の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を負う味方（使用者自身を含む）の人数分、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
ベネボレンティア ― 信奉者が必要
各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、使用者は50％以下の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を負う味方それぞれ（使用者自身を含む）に <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Devoto
Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} (excluyendo los {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}), el portador obtiene +{unit_stat|Resolve} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} por cada aliado (incluyéndose a sí mismo) con el 50 % o menos de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +{unit_stat|Resolve} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Devoto
Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} (excluyendo los {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}), el portador obtiene +{unit_stat|Resolve} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} por cada aliado (incluyéndose a sí mismo) con el 50 % o menos de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} — Geweihter
Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} (ausgenommen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g}) erhält der Träger +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheits{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}dynamik{/g} für jeden Verbündeten (einschließlich sich selbst) mit 50 % oder weniger {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Benevolentia – Geweihter
Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Träger <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} für jeden Verbündeten (einschließlich sich selbst) mit 50 % oder weniger {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Disciple
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} (sauf {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}), l'utilisateur gagne {unit_stat|Resolve} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} pour chaque allié (y compris lui-même) dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 50 %.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +{unit_stat|Resolve} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Benevolentia — Disciple
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} pour chaque allié (y compris lui-même) dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 50 %.

Requiert Benevolentia — Disciple
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} pour chaque allié (y compris lui-même) dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 50 %.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Coşkulu kanaati gerektirir
Takan kişi, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başında ({g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek turlar{/g} hariç) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50 veya daha az olan her dost birim için (kendisi de dâhil) +{unit_stat|Resolve} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
